In this single-mode game, your mission is to stack up the highest score by nailing the older event, invention, or cultural moment. Our list covers everything from the first flicker of fire to the rise of modern gadgets, packed with epic achievements, quirky discoveries, and surprising milestones.

Get it right, and your score soars. Get it wrong, and you’re back to the Stone Age to try again! Perfect for history lovers, trivia fans, or anyone who enjoys a chuckle while learning something new, What is Older? will keep you guessing about the past. Ready to show you’re the sharpest time traveler around? Jump in and start picking!
70010000108741.intro: Think you know the history? Jump into the game and find out – choose wisely and become the champion!
70010000108741.name: What is Older?

70010000109183.description:
Take the role of a young graduate student in AI studies in Baradroid. Evan lives with 3 robots as a means of studying their behavior and teaching them to interact more naturally with humans. Evan hopes to develop a new generation of androids based on his research, one that can advance society and help overcome human limitations, but over time, one question grows in his mind.

Is it possible to teach a machine the meaning of human love? Baradroid is a visual novel and dating sim set in a futuristic and idealized world. Make key choices for Evan that guide the narrative and perhaps some romance as well… for science, of course.

• Explore relationships between a researcher and his robots!
• Immerse yourself in a futuristic visual novel adventure!
• Guide Evan’s efforts to advance AI technology!
• Make decisions that affect the narrative!
• Enjoy dating sim elements and unlockable scenes!
70010000109183.intro: Teach robots to experience love in a futuristic world where the lines between humanity and synthetic life begin to blur!
70010000109183.name: Baradroid

70050000056209.description:
This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Fuscus! 
Puzzle your way through 160 brand-new levels!
70050000056209.intro: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Fuscus brings 160 new puzzles and includes all mechanics from the previous DLC.
70050000056209.name: Fuscus

70050000066415.description:
The Nintendo Switch 2 Edition delivers enhanced visuals and improved playability.
Experience a new level of immersion.

【Intuitive operation with mouse support】
Supports mouse operation using Joy-Con™ 2 and USB mice.
You can lay tracks and build structures more intuitively.
We've also added options to adjust UI size and main menu icon layout for easier mouse-based play.

【Playable in “Nintendo Switch 2 Mode”】
Added “Nintendo Switch 2 Mode,” which allows you to use more railway vehicles, automobiles, and vehicle plans than usual!
Extend your routes to every corner of the city, run more trains, and make the city even more convenient.
(Save data created in this mode is for play on Nintendo Switch 2 only.)

【Enhanced Graphics & Frame Rate】
Enhanced screen resolution, improved textures, and water reflections make graphics more beautiful, while increased maximum frame rates deliver smoother motion!
Enjoy the sight of trains running through towns with heightened immersion.
*Some effects require enabling graphics options.

【Added Convenient Features】
Auto save feature included! If you make a mistake, you can revert to a state from a little while ago.
It also supports the Nintendo Switch 2's built-in “GameChat” feature.

※Additional scenarios are available in Japanese only.
※This product is additional content exclusively for “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism.” If you do not own “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism,” please purchase the bundle product “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition.”
70050000066415.intro: A bustling city plan just for you
70050000066415.name: A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70010000092684.description: Nordic Ashes is a challenging Norse inspired roguelite-survivor game, where you’ll have to survive hordes of creatures that come your way.
70010000092684.name: Nordic Ashes: The Complete Saga

70010000096352.description:
Build your dream arcade at your own pace. No pressure, no deadlines, just a cozy space to fill with games, decorations, warm neon lights and a bite-sized playthrough duration. 

Create
Design your arcade from the ground up, shaping its layout while choosing from a handful of structures, furniture, decoration and arcade machines.


Unlock
Use your Computer to unlock new objects, expand your land and customize your character.


Enjoy
Invite charming, randomly generated alien guests and watch them spend time in your creation.


Are you ready to bring your dream arcade to life?
70010000096352.intro: A cozy sci-fi arcade sim where you build, customize, unlock, expand and welcome cute alien visitors!
70010000096352.name: Cosmic Arcade Tycoon

70010000099931.description:
Step into the whimsical world of Cup Heroes, where everyday cups turn into mighty heroes on an epic quest to save their beloved Queen! 

How to Play: 
- Control Your Heroes: Navigate your heroes through various obstacles and puzzles. 
- Save the Queen: Your ultimate goal is to rescue the Queen who has been captured by evil forces. 
- Unlock and Upgrade Characters: Collect coins and gems to unlock a diverse cast of characters, each with unique abilities. Upgrade their skills to make them even more powerful and adaptable to different challenges. 

Features: 
- Unique Characters: Meet a colourful cast of cup heroes, from the brave Knight Cup to the cunning Ninja Cup. Each character brings their own special skills and personality to the team. 
- Epic Adventures: Explore various enchanting worlds, from mystical forests to fiery volcanoes. Every level is a new adventure filled with hidden secrets and dangerous foes. 
- Challenging Puzzles: Test your brain with mind-bending puzzles that require clever solutions. Use your heroes’ abilities to overcome obstacles and progress through the game. 
- Exciting Battles: Engage in thrilling combat with evil minions and powerful bosses. Use your heroes’ special moves and teamwork to defeat enemies and save the Queen. 
- Beautiful Graphics: Enjoy stunning, colourful graphics that bring the world of Cup Heroes to life. Each scene is meticulously designed to enhance your gaming experience. 
- Daily Quests: Log in every day to participate in limited-time quests to earn multiple resources
- Addictive Gameplay: Easy to learn but hard to master

Your Cup Heroes are waiting for you to lead them to victory!
70010000099931.intro: Join the adventure of a lifetime!
70010000099931.name: Cup Heroes

70010000107332.description:
Krampus is Coming! Grab your shotgun, finish your hot punch and don't forget your mission: Save the Christmas! 

Big Trouble in Little Chimney is a fast paced arena bullet-hell shooter.

Survive endless hordes of creatures lurk from the dark chimney and save the Christmas!

Try to beat your highscore!


Features:
* Simple controls and pure arcade action
* Quick 10 minute play sessions
* Over 10 brutal enemy types
* Plenty of guns
* Collect jingle bells and earn new upgrades as you progress
* Unlock New Weapons and special abilities in the Santa's Store
* 2 Game modes: Krampus is coming, Giftpocalypse
* Great music by Kevin MacLeod
70010000107332.intro: Save the Christmas by shooting enemies.
70010000107332.name: Big Trouble in Little Chimney

70050000066540.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Japan map
- Tanuki Skin
- Sensei Skin
- Sushi Master Skin
- Koi Carp Skin
- Geisha Skin
- Tengu Skin
- Kitsune Skin

Choose your cool skin, eat bamboo, shrines, statues, cherry blossoms, castles and grow BIG!
70050000066540.intro: Wear traditional skins and visit the new Japan map with your friends!
70050000066540.name: Hole io: Japan DLC

70050000066555.description:
With DLC, You'll unlock:
- The Legendary boxer: El Loco!
- His iconic gloves, shorts and shoes!
- 21500 experience

See for yourself how it feels to be a boxing legend!
70050000066555.intro: Play as the legendary El Loco and relive his journey to the top!
70050000066555.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - El Loco DLC

70050000066556.description:
With DLC, You'll unlock:
- The Legendary boxer: Mark Rouser!
- His iconic gloves, shorts and shoes!
- 21500 experience

See for yourself how it feels to be a boxing legend!
70050000066556.intro: Play as the legendary Mark Rouser and relive his journey to the top!
70050000066556.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Mark Rouser DLC

70070000031927.description:
Spy Guy is the perfect game for any occasion! Take on the role of a detective and search for hidden objects on various maps in three modes. 
For Christmas, we have created a set that will not only reveal the Christmas map included in the main game, but also take you on a journey to different cities! It's a unique gift you can give yourself for Christmas and beyond!
70070000031927.intro: Make yourself a gift and buy a detective game for Christmas!
70070000031927.name: Spy Guy Christmas

70070000032327.description:
Choose your favorite skin, eat, grow and stay alive. Compete in multiplayer mode with up to 4 players or eat it all by yourself.

Hole io: Blossom Edition features:
- 7 maps with different things to swallow 
- 20 animated skins to make your black hole look cooler
- 2 multiplayer modes up to 4 players on one screen!
- endless mode where you swallow things falling from the sky
- powerups spawning during the game
- collecting themed stickers
- easy controls so anyone can play
- simple rules and lots of fun!

Grow by swallowing everything in front of you, whether it be garbage cans, fire hydrants or cars. Get large enough to consume even bigger objects or other players. Eat until nothing and no one is standing in your way!
70070000032327.intro: Show who is the biggest black hole in the entire universe!
70070000032327.name: Hole io: Blossom Edition

70070000032356.description:
Discover a whole new world of combat sports games. As a newbie boxer, challenge experienced opponents and try to win and score a KO! Explore the world of boxing and make your way to the top. You can become the boxing champion, the best warrior of all time! So get ready to punch, and punch hard! Discover what you’re made of, and try to climb to the top.

This bundle includes: 
- Real Boxing 2: Remastered
- Real Boxing 2: Remastered - El Loco DLC

Become the ultimate champion! Use jabs, hooks, uppercuts & combine them into devastating combos.

PLAY AS A LEGENDARY BOXER
Receive the legendary El Loco with his unique equipment and a bonus of 21500 experience points right from the start!

REMASTERED VERSION
A brand new challenge awaits you as the game has been rebalanced for a fresh and fair boxing experience. With better effects and improved graphics you can feel like you're boxing for real!

CHOOSE YOUR STYLE OF BOXING
Before you KO your opponent, you need to improve your fighting skills! Adjust your boxer's stats to match your playstyle and level up quickly to unlock new abilities that will help you in fights to come! Use powerful boosts to make your dream come true. Get ready - a KO is in the air!

PLAY MINI-GAMES
Train your fighter in exciting mini games that reflect real life boxers’ training and develop your character! You need to leave a lot of sweat in your training hall to be a champion. No one said it would be an easy challenge!

CREATE YOUR DREAM BOXER
Real Boxing 2 allows you to customize your fighter! Choose your outfit, get a new tattoo and even change your haircut. Adjust all the aspects of the fighter’s body, from mass and muscle sculpture to nose shape.

DRESS TO IMPRESS
As in all fighting sports, it's best to enter the punch-out and serve a smackdown with style, so gear up - equip a pair of boots, trousers and gloves that fit your style and knock down your opponents with your looks alone.

BATTLE AGAINST UNIQUE BOSSES
Take on challenging opponents! Clown? Check. Santa? Yeah, he's there. A real stone golem? You bet. Defeat them all and claim their epic gear!

Join the club, create your boxer, and start your boxing career. Get ready to punch, and punch hard! Discover what you’re made of, and climb to the top!
70070000032356.intro: Take the fight to the next level with a remaster of award winning Real Boxing™ 2. Train hard, fight harder. Prove your worth in the career and multiplayer mode.
70070000032356.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - El Loco Edition

70010000105313.description:
America has fallen into enemy hands. It’s up to you to fight back! Build your defenses, rally your firepower, and lead the charge to take the nation back - state by state, battle by battle.

Strategically deploy turrets, unleash devastating machine guns, and adapt your tactics to survive relentless enemy waves and towering bosses. Every victory pushes the front lines forward and brings you one step closer to restoring freedom across the land.

Earn cash from every fallen foe, upgrade your weapons, and unlock powerful new gear to hold the line. Each liberated state strengthens your army and opens up new challenges, enemies, and rewards. With every push and every win, you’re shaping the future of a free America!

Features:
- Tower defense-inspired gameplay with intense tactical action
- Tons of weapons, turrets, and upgrades to build your unstoppable defense
- Ruthless enemies and bosses to test your strategy and reflexes
- Dozens of states and countries to liberate, each with unique challenges and rewards
- Strategic progression system. Earn resources, upgrade gear, and conquer!

Take back the land. Rebuild the nation. Fight For America!
70010000105313.intro: Gear up, soldier - it’s time to reclaim freedom!
70010000105313.name: Fight For America

70010000109949.description:
Take control of a mighty dinosaur in a post-apocalyptic world on a quest to recover its stolen eggs.

Smash through environments, gather resources, and hunt grotesque human-mutants to evolve and grow stronger. Use what you collect to rebuild bridges, restore paths and push deeper into a world filled with danger and mystery. 

Explore vast landscapes, uncover hidden secrets and face terrifying bosses standing between you and your lost brood.

Features:
- Break everything: destroy environments and leave nothing standing
- Use advanced technology: encounter futuristic machines that will aid your survival
- Engage in fierce battles: hunt down mutants and monstrous creatures
- Meet various enemies: take on diverse foes with unique behaviors
- Lead your warriors: command other beasts and dominate the wasteland
- Evolve to become a super beast: grow stronger with every challenge you overcome!

Will you survive and recover your eggs?
70010000109949.name: Raptor Evolution

70010000111494.description:
Explore sunken ships, submarines, and mysterious underwater ruins filled with hidden treasures and fascinating artifacts.

Take your time as you navigate detailed environments, complete exploration objectives, and collect items scattered across the sea floor. Examine each discovery up close, uncovering the secrets of lost vessels and forgotten places.

Features:
• Explore detailed underwater locations, from shipwrecks to ancient ruins
• Find, collect, and examine a wide range of items and relics
• Complete various exploration objectives
• Enjoy a calm, atmospheric experience with no danger or combat
• Relax with immersive underwater sounds and a selection of 9 atmospheric music tracks

Dive deeper, explore further, and uncover what the ocean hides.
70010000111494.intro: Your next great discovery lies just below the surface
70010000111494.name: Dive Expedition

70050000066472.description:
Expand your underwater adventure with the Plane Wreck DLC, introducing a new map filled with thrilling discoveries.

Explore the remains of a crashed airplane lying on the ocean floor and search for valuable objects both inside and around the wreck. Examine lost supplies, gold bars, weapons, and military equipment resting quietly beneath the waves.

With this DLC, you’ll unlock:
• New map to explore - Plane Wreck
• Additional objects and items to find and examine
• New exploration objectives to complete

Start your new expedition and uncover what lies beneath the surface.
70050000066472.intro: Dive into the depths and explore the mysteries of a sunken airplane
70050000066472.name: Dive Expedition: Plane Wreck DLC

70050000066474.description:
Expand your underwater adventure with the Sunken Ship DLC, introducing a new map filled with mystery and treasure.

Explore the remains of a historic ship resting silently beneath the waves. Swim across its wooden decks, peek inside the captain’s cabin, and uncover what remains of its fateful voyage. Search for chests of gold, rare relics, and lost equipment hidden throughout the ship and surrounding seabed.

With this DLC, you’ll unlock:
• New map to explore - Sunken Ship
• Additional objects and items to find and examine
• New exploration objectives to complete

Start your new expedition and uncover what lies beneath the surface.
70050000066474.intro: Dive into the depths and explore the mysteries of a legendary sunken ship
70050000066474.name: Dive Expedition: Sunken Ship DLC

70050000066647.description:
Transform your raptor into a futuristic predator with the Vectoraptor skin - a neon-coated beast powered by pure energy and precision. 

Power up your journey with valuable resources that will fuel your evolution and give you the edge against any enemy that dares to cross your path.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Vectoraptor Skin
- 300 Meat
- 20 Mutagen
- 450 Gems

Unleash your full potential and reclaim your place at the top of the food chain.
70050000066647.intro: Charge into battle with unstoppable energy!
70050000066647.name: Raptor Evolution: Vectoraptor DLC

70050000066649.description:
Set the world ablaze with the Infermadon skin - a raging raptor born from fire. 

Power up your journey with valuable resources that will fuel your evolution and give you the strength to conquer even the fiercest enemies.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Infermadon Skin
- 200 Meat
- 30 Mutagen
- 400 Gems

Unleash your full potential and reclaim your place at the top of the food chain.
70050000066649.intro: Unleash the fury of fire and chaos!
70050000066649.name: Raptor Evolution: Infermadon DLC

70050000066651.description:
Radiate strength and grace with the Celestosaurus skin - a majestic raptor glowing with cosmic energy. 

Power up your journey with valuable resources that will fuel your evolution and help you face every challenge ahead.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Celestosaurus Skin
- 400 Meat
- 15 Mutagen
- 500 Gems

Unleash your full potential and reclaim your place at the top of the food chain.
70050000066651.intro: Soar beyond the stars with celestial power!
70050000066651.name: Raptor Evolution: Celestosaurus DLC

70050000066712.description:
Crush your enemies from inside the mighty Iron Patriot mech! Rain firepower upon invaders and turn the tide with enhanced strength, speed, and durability. Once deployed, nothing can stand in your way.

Boost your campaign with 1000 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Iron Patriot Mech (x1.5 movement speed, x1.5 max health, x1.5 base damage)
- 1000 Coins

Rule the battlefield with unstoppable steel and fire!
70050000066712.intro: Suit up and dominate the battlefield!
70050000066712.name: Fight For America: Iron Patriot DLC

70050000066715.description:
Unleash the ultimate energy with the Zap Gun! Strike down hordes of enemies with devastating electric blasts that chain through multiple targets and deal massive long-range damage.

Boost your campaign with 4000 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Zap Gun
- 4000 Coins

Bring the thunder, turn the tide, and show no mercy!
70050000066715.intro: Shock the battlefield with electrifying power!
70050000066715.name: Fight For America: Zap Gun DLC

70050000066717.description:
Unleash the Golden Amcar, a perfectly balanced assault rifle built for any fight. With solid damage, range, and fire rate, this golden masterpiece is your most versatile weapon on the battlefield – reliable, powerful, and shining bright in every mission.

Boost your campaign with 4000 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Golden Amcar
- 4000 Coins

Lock, load, and let your golden firepower shine!
70050000066717.intro: Go for gold with the ultimate all-around weapon!
70050000066717.name: Fight For America: Golden Gun DLC

70050000066718.description:
Unleash fiery destruction with the Flamethrower and Grenade Launcher! Burn multiple enemies at once with a blazing stream of fire, or rain explosive chaos with powerful grenades that deal massive area damage. No matter the threat, you’ll reduce it to rubble and ash.

Boost your campaign with 2500 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Flamethrower
- Grenade Launcher
- 2500 Coins

Burn through enemy lines and leave nothing but ashes behind!
70050000066718.intro: Ignite the battlefield and watch your enemies burn!
70050000066718.name: Fight For America: Fire Guns DLC

70050000066721.description:
Bring the cold to the front lines with the Snowball Launcher and Blizzard! Blast single targets with powerful snowballs that deal massive damage, or freeze entire enemy waves in their tracks with icy winds that slow them down. Perfect for setting up your turrets to finish the job.

Boost your campaign with 2500 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Snowball Launcher
- Blizzard
- 2500 Coins

Turn the tide with frost and fury, and show your enemies no mercy!
70050000066721.intro: Freeze the battlefield and shatter your enemies!
70050000066721.name: Fight For America: Ice Guns DLC

70070000032386.description:
Enjoy your short life as a hot dog playing SOLO or with FRIENDS! (up to 8 players)

This edition includes:
- base game with 150 deadly levels and tasty powerups
- fresh sausage pack of 15 new skins (Brain Monster, Eye Monster, Xray Monster, Caveman, Witch, Teacher, Angler, Country Girl, Hunter, Beekeeper, Firefly, Toxic, Painter, Policeman, Prisoner)

Choose your sausage and run for your life! This race is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.
70070000032386.intro: The most exciting sausage race in the world! Let the bodies hit the floor in a ketchup bath!
70070000032386.name: Run Sausage Run!: Diamond Edition

70070000032017.description:
Awaken your inner engineer with the brainteasing circuitry of Electronics Puzzle Lab! In this fun and educational 3D puzzle game, your task is to inspect circuit boards and make adjustments to power LED lights. Take a seat at your workbench, cut wires, flip switches and more as you trace the path of the current.

This collection contains 2 games:

Electronics Puzzle Lab
Electronics Puzzle Lab 2
70070000032017.intro: Awaken your inner engineer with 3D puzzles inspired by electronic circuitry!
70070000032017.name: Electronics Puzzle Lab 1 & 2 Collection

70010000111240.description:
A Sokoban-style puzzle game featuring 8-bit pixel art, chiptune soundtrack and 100 handcrafted levels.

Step into the boots of the newest recruit of the Island Courier Guild and deliver enchanted parcels to seal points scattered across the ocean-touched isles.

Play as Kai or Nami, and push, plan, and puzzle your way through a world of clever challenges to prove yourself as the next Master Courier!
70010000111240.intro: A Sokoban-style puzzle game with pixel art
70010000111240.name: Parcel Push

70010000109923.description:
Step into the world, where mundane tasks turn into little adventures and ordinary items provide so much joy. See everything around you in bright, new, vibrant colors and make things even more beautiful by adding fun patterns. Wake up your inner child and find the happiness in little things.
 
Each level of the game consists of a unique challenge, providing fresh, yet relaxing gameplay, that will make you curious for what’s coming next. 

KEY FEATURES: 
-40 unique cozy puzzle levels
-Gameplay consisting of different types of challenges
-Beautiful, vibrant visuals, where everyday items turn into something magical
-Relaxing, cheerful soundtrack 
-Inspiring, nostalgic atmosphere
-Variety of puzzles exercising different parts of the brain
70010000109923.intro: Unleash the childlike wonder and find the magic in everyday life! Place, fit, fill, cook, connect, and train your brain in the cutest possible way.
70010000109923.name: Softly Placed

70010000111262.description:
In Hypercar Racing you'll enjoy the dirtiest, fastest, and most spectacular races at speeds over 200 Mp/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 8 adversaries. The game has different modes, such as Championship, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer.

Online ranking chart where you can compare your best times with friends and players from all over the world.

Features:

-Arcade driving
-4-Player Multiplayer
-Online Ranking
-Achievements
70010000111262.intro: Get ready to feel the speed!
70010000111262.name: Hypercar Racing

70050000056435.description: Adds Character 2 to the roster of playable characters.
70050000056435.name: Additional Character 2

70070000029707.description:
Dive into non-stop entertainment with 12 Party Games Collection - a bundle packed with exciting games that bring instant fun to any gathering.

Jump between fan-favorite hits: Hole io, Paper io 2, Skyline Bowling, Mob Control, Candivity, Golf Guys, Aquapark io, Ball Blast, Helix Jump, Puff Up, Pocket Mini Golf, and Pocket Mini Golf 2. Each game offers its own twist - from quick reflex challenges and arcade chaos to skill-based precision and pure, satisfying gameplay.

Play solo to master each game or share the joy with friends in friendly competitions up to 4 players! Discover your favorites, chase new high scores, and see who dominates the next round. Whether it’s a quick session or an all-night gaming marathon, every match brings something fresh to the table.

12 ways to play -12 times the fun!
70070000029707.intro: 12 games. Endless fun. One ultimate party pack!
70070000029707.name: 12 Party Games Collection

70070000032332.description:
Grab your bricks, get building, and race to the finish line before your rivals even lay their first stone! Collect bricks of your color and build your bridge to the next level. Got some extra bricks? Use them to expand your castle and unlock quirky new brick designs!

This bundle includes:
- Bridge Race
- Bridge Race: Medieval DLC
- Bridge Race: Busy DLC
- Bridge Race: Funny DLC

NEW VERSUS MODE FOR UP TO 4 PLAYERS!
Compete with your friends in an exciting head-to-head split-screen showdown. Choose your custom color and unique skin, set the number of rounds, and let your building skills shine. Earn points each round based on your finish, and see who rises to the top of the leaderboard. Ready to show off your skills and claim victory? 

Features:
- 11 additional skins to show off your style!
- 35000 coins to help you on your journey!
- Build across endless levels of fun!
- Local multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!
- Customize your bricks and character for a unique look!
- Expand your castle with extra bricks!
- Challenge yourself in epic bonus and boss stages!

Want to slow the competition down? No problem! Trip them up and zoom ahead to claim first place. Crush those bonus levels to stack up coins, and then use them to unlock new skins and colors to show off your style!

Outbuild, outsmart, and outlast the competition -who knew building bridges could be this much fun?
70070000032332.intro: Build your way to victory, one brick at a time!
70070000032332.name: Bridge Race: Platinum Edition

70010000111785.description:
A little girl with a big heart goes on a mysterious journey through dangerous lands ruled by a ruthless cult. Make choices that will help her save her parents. You decide what happens in the story!

In Adventure Reborn the story depends on your choices. It’s a magical tale about the power of love overcoming the evil. Become a part of it, help Hope solve all the puzzles and save her parents. This family’s fate is in your hands!

Why are you going to love Adventure Reborn:
- A touching story about the power of love
- Your choices influence the story
- An adventure full of twists and surprises
- The characters’ fates depend on your decisions
- A story of a family that risks it all to be together
70010000111785.intro: Adventure Reborn is a deeply moving adventure game where you make decisions that influence the story of a loving family!
70010000111785.name: Adventure Reborn

70010000081871.description: In the rural town of Yushibana, the Ashiya family holds much of the wealth. After they discover a rare gemstone, a showing is scheduled in Ashiya Tower, drawing the attention of many of the townspeople. However, during the exhibit, the tower is flooded with smoke, activating emergency shutters that trap eight people inside. With twelve hours until their release, they must grapple with an increasingly complex series of unnatural events.
70010000081871.intro: Can you unravel the tangled events within the sealed tower?
70010000081871.name: The Sekimeiya: Spun Glass

70010000086483.description:
Dunk Dunk is a basketball game unlike any other, mixing a unique cartoony aesthetic, the strategy and precision of basketball with the chaotic fun of multiplayer arena platforming action, making for some nail-bitingly tense matches.

Play alone, with a friend or a house full of friends. Dress up your mascots and dunk basketballs, balloons or even anvils in crazy locations from all over the universe like space stations, dinosaur parks and haunted houses. It's dunk or be dunked (on). 

EASY TO PICK UP
Plays like your favourite platformer with familiar and simple controls meaning anyone can take to the court and start dunking.

MASTER YOUR BALL CONTROL
AIM & THROW – Total 360° analogue arm control allows you to AIM, THROW and slam DUNK the ball at the exact angle you want. 

BLOCK & DEFLECT – Defend your goal! Extend your whole body for a stretchy block or deflection to keep your opponents from scoring. Or, become a platform to help your teammates reach that hoop.

FEINT & SHIELD – Fool your opponent with a fake throw or shield the ball by holding it out of your opponent's reach.

SOLO, CO-OP AND PVP MODES
Play solo or co-op with a friend in Quick Match, or against increasingly harder opponents in Galaxy Tour, Challenge or Cup modes. Or take on a friend, or up to 16 friends, in local multiplayer across the Quick Match, Mutator Madness and Tournament modes.

CUSTOMISE YOUR DUNKER
Want to play as a purple-robo-vampire-shark? We got it covered. Customise your characters with hundreds of different body parts and more than 2 and a half million procedural team and player names. Who knows, there might even be cameo appearances. Wouldn't that be cool?

DUNK ACROSS THE UNIVERSE
Play across 8 unique arenas from all over the universe. From an underwater lab to dinosaur times and a marooned space station, each arena has its own special features.
70010000086483.intro: Dunk with or on your friends in Dunk Dunk, a multiplayer action basketball arcade party game full of chaotic fun.
70010000086483.name: Dunk Dunk

70050000046104.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000053032.description:
Vagrus’s second expansion offers a tight but multi-layered and dense region fraught with conflict and rich with opportunities. Vagri who decide to brave the forsaken paths of this broken realm will be challenged not only by new foes and villains, but also by the very nature one must traverse the mountainous terrain.

New Content and Features

- A fresh, dangerous region unfettered from Imperial dominance and brimming with peril
- A dark narrative adventure with several overarching stories as well as shorter adventures
- Deep quests with multiple outcomes and a plethora of personalities
- Many new opportunities and challenges for traders, mercenaries, and explorers
- A host of new enemies, be they crazed scavengers or creatures cursed beyond recognition
- A large cast of NPCs, some new and some old, who can be a part of your story
- New minor factions the likes of which few vagri have ever had the chance to befriend or fight against
- New obstacles, rewards, lore, and more of our signature visual art
70050000053032.name: Vagrus - The Riven Realms At the Heart of Ruin

70050000053128.description:
＼＼ Digital Bey Booster Vol.2／／

Purchasing expands the pool of cards available in-game.

*This content is scheduled to be distributed by the end of December 2025. Details will be released at a later date.

*Please be sure to download the latest version of the main version.

70050000054560.name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD 2:Card Unlock Vol.1

70050000055684.description: Travel to Lemuria and investigate a deep reaching conspiracy that has infiltrated the upper echelons of Lemurian aristocracy and its King. Mingle with new age cults from India, gurus with potentially supernatural powers and charlatans that just want to scam westerners in Codename: [REDACTED].
70050000055684.name: Investigations #2 - Codename [REDACTED]

70050000055689.description: When reports of the unlawful use of Lemurian technology begin to surface, an inquisition squad is sent to investigate - but are they truly immune to the Idol’s influence? Explore a world before modern technology and catch a glimpse at the world during the creation of the artifact itself in Codename: Inquisition.
70050000055689.name: Investigations #3 - Codename: Inquisition

70010000106501.description:
Go Kart Island is an open world kart racer with full story mode! 

Lachlan the highland cow has a dream to become Go Kart Champion, but the Mayor has an election campaign to fund and demands you raise 1,000 coins for an "entry fee" to the BIG RACE. 

Fortunately the inhabitants of Go Kart Island have no shortage of activities they would like you to partake in and they offer cold, hard cash as a reward.

EVENT TYPES

Races: Classic karting rules apply in 6 different race types, use items to take out your opponents and reach the finish in 1st place! 
Time Trials: The islanders are an impatient bunch and need your help to get to their destination as fast as possible, just watch out for obstacles.
Collect: Things are lost, and you have to track them down and run them over with your kart as fast as possible.
Chase: Either hunt down a target or escape from your pursuers.
Deliver: Pick up customers and get them to their destination as quickly as possible in the pursuit of a high score!

KEY FEATURES

- A full story mode with 34 different events in an open world setting.
- Giraffes? Turtles? SHEEP? We’ve got ‘em all. 32 different animals to chat with, race against, and unlock!
- Aim for the gold trophy in 84 challenges, adding a new twist and replayability to events completed in story mode.
- A variety of items to use on opponents and obstacles to avoid, including the homing pizza (delivered in 3 seconds or less), the splatula (get it? Splatula! Cause it splats…) and the aptly named Squish-E-Boi Cube.
- Over 150 collectables to find. Collect coins, gems and smash the mayor’s advertising boards!
- Fully honkable kart horn. HONK!
70010000106501.intro: An open world kart racer! Use items, driftslide and boost your way to championship glory.
70010000106501.name: Go Kart Island

70010000104757.description:
Moles have declared war. The animal world is in chaos. Naturally, the solution is tanks.

In BattleTanks - Animal Wars, you’ll roll into battle as a Racoon, Bear, Wolf or even Panda (yes, really) and blast your way through five bizarre worlds filled with explosions, bad driving, and questionable military decisions.

Customize your ride with different weapons and weird tank parts. 

- 80+ story missions featuring combat, defense, side-scrolling chaos, and puzzles
- Ridiculous mech-bosses that really, really don’t like you
- Local co-op for up to 4 players - because friendship means firing wildly in every direction

Switch between top-down mayhem and first-person fury, and take down the mole menace once and for all. Or at least… blow them up repeatedly.
70010000104757.intro:
Save the animal kingdom from mole-fueled doom.
Face giant mech-bosses, collect weapons and build you tank.
Unleash tank fury - solo or with friends!
70010000104757.name: BattleTanks - Animal Wars

70010000110441.description:
A carefree new life is just beyond the horizon! Step off the plane and onto your very own deserted island where new friends, discoveries and opportunities are waiting for you.

New ways to play
The Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of Animal Crossing: New Horizons uses the unique features of the console to offer even more ways to enjoy your island paradise!

Your island, clearer than ever
With the enhanced 4K resolution of the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, you’ll be able to see your island and its residents even clearer than before!

Get creative with mouse controls
Use the intuitive mouse controls of the Joy-Con 2 controller to redecorate your home, organise your furniture, create Custom Designs and even draw posts for the bulletin board.

New item: Megaphone
Purchase the Megaphone from Nook's Cranny, then use it to find your island friends by calling out their names. The built-in microphone of Nintendo Switch 2 will help find where they are, even if they’re far away from you!

Play with more friends at once!
In the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, up to 12 players can play together on one island online or up to eight players via local wireless play.

With GameChat, you’ll be able to talk to your friends while playing with them. And by connecting a compatible USB-C camera, such as the Nintendo Switch 2 camera (sold separately), they’ll be able to see your expressions as you play!
70010000110441.intro: Welcome to the Deserted Island Getaway Package!
70010000110441.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70050000065275.description:
New ways to play
The Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of Animal Crossing: New Horizons uses the unique features of the console to offer even more ways to enjoy your island paradise!

Your island, clearer than ever
With the enhanced 4K resolution of the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, you’ll be able to see your island and its residents even clearer than before!

Get creative with mouse controls
Use the intuitive mouse controls of the Joy-Con 2 controller to redecorate your home, organise your furniture, create Custom Designs and even draw posts for the bulletin board.

New item: Megaphone
Purchase the Megaphone from Nook's Cranny, then use it to find your island friends by calling out their names. The built-in microphone of Nintendo Switch 2 will help find where they are, even if they’re far away from you!

Play with more friends at once!
In the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, up to 12 players can play together on one island online or up to eight players via local wireless play.

With GameChat, you’ll be able to talk to your friends while playing with them. And by connecting a compatible USB-C camera, such as the Nintendo Switch 2 camera (sold separately), they’ll be able to see your expressions as you play!


Animal Crossing: New Horizons for Nintendo Switch required to use this upgrade pack, sold separately.
70050000065275.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70010000096781.description:
Outrun your friends. Outsmart your rivals. Out-chaos them all!
From the makers of Running Fable comes Petite Party, a wild and unpredictable spin-off that cranks up the chaos. Battle through 16 competitive mini-games and dominate the tabletop party board where anything goes. In Running Fable Petite Party, there’s no holding back — every round is a chance to taunt your friends, steal victory, and cause maximum mayhem.

Key Features:
- 16 Mayhem-Fueled Mini-Games – Outsprint, outbalance, outwit, or outright sabotage your friends in quick-fire challenges designed to trigger laughs and playful rage.
- Tabletop Strategy Meets Party Madness – Roll the dice and plan across 3 competitive boards where the smallest choices lead to the biggest betrayals.
- Rivalry Ready – Perfect for 1–4 players; whether you’re teaming up or turning on each other, every match is a test of speed, reflexes, and friendship.
- Designed for Teasing – Easy controls mean anyone can join in, but only the bold (and lucky) can claim victory. Trash talk encouraged.
- From the World of Running Fable – Return to a vibrant, fabled universe full of quirky characters, ridiculous physics, and hilarious animations.

It’s not just a party — it’s a battlefield disguised in balloons.
Running Fable Petite Party is what happens when tabletop strategy meets competitive chaos. Who will stand victorious? And who will never live that loss down?
70010000096781.intro: Running Fable Petite Party throws you and your friends into 16 fast-paced, friendship-testing mini-games across 3 tabletop arenas.
70010000096781.name: Running Fable Petite Party

70050000059891.description:
Content Details:
- 10 new recipes for combat items and equipment
- 10 new catalyst ingredients and intermediary ingredients

Note:

70050000059891.intro: A pack of useful recipes for your adventure.
70050000059891.name: Recipe Expansion Pack "The Essence of Alchemy"

- Please check the official site for details.
70050000059893.intro: Experience and unexplored land in this strange and high-difficulty dungeon.
70050000059893.name: High-Difficulty Dungeon "Backwards-Ticking Clock Workshop"

70050000059375.description:
Additional content for the battle arena in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

<The Road of Regal Wretches>
Challenge legendary demon kings from the DRAGON QUEST series’ Erdrick Trilogy in the Battle Arena! Defeat them to earn valuable rewards, including “Erdrick’s Sword”!

[Monsters you can fight in The Road of Regal Wretches]
・The Original Demon
・Master of Destruction
・The Lord of Darkness

*This product does not include the base game of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.
*This product is also included in the "Digital Deluxe Edition" and the "Additional DLC Sets". Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*To play The Road of Regal Wretches, you will need to progress in the game and unlock the battle arena.
*The Road of Regal Wretches can be accessed by talking to the She-Slime at the battle arena reception desk.
70050000059375.name: The Road of Regal Wretches

70050000059378.description:
A set of costumes for DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

<Luminary's Livery>
Dress up as the characters from DRAGON QUEST XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age with this costume set! 
Put these outfits on from time to time for a nice change of pace!

[Contents]
・Luminary's Livery (Appearance changing costume for your Hero)
・Spiky Sidekick's Costume (Appearance changing costume for Kiefer)
・Red Sisterly Smock (Appearance changing costume for Maribel)

Includes the full game, "Additional DLC Sets", and 48 hours of early access to the full game. Embark on an epic adventure ahead of everybody else!

[Contents]

・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined "Additional DLC Sets"

*After the launch of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined, the "Additional DLC Sets" and each additional DLC will also be available for individual purchase. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*Some items in the additional DLCs can also be obtained by progressing in the game.
*To play The Road of Regal Wretches, you will need to progress in the game and unlock the battle arena.
*The Road of Regal Wretches can be accessed by talking to the She-Slime at the battle arena reception desk.
*Contents such as the costumes and items can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in the game.

*This product is a bundle that includes DRAGON QUEST VII, released for Nintendo Switch™, and additional content pertaining to that title.
*This product can be played on both Nintendo Switch™ and Nintendo Switch™ 2, but there is also a separate version of DRAGON QUEST VII that can only be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
*This product is not compatible with the DRAGON QUEST VII Digital Deluxe Upgrade released for Nintendo Switch™ 2.
*The content included in this bundle is also sold separately. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
70070000029518.intro: Unravel the mysteries of the past in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined
70070000029518.name: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000070158.description:
"There's more to the world than this island... And we're going to prove it!"

Set sail on an adventure spanning past and present in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined!

As a bright-eyed young fisherman's son, you've lived your entire life on the peaceful island of Estard. Your journey begins with a simple question: is there more to the world than this small island kingdom?

On a quest for answers, you and your childhood friends discover the Shrine of Mysteries and are swept back in time. There, you uncover the shocking truth that entire lands have been sealed away by a malevolent force.

The fate of the world now rests in your hands.

DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined brings a timeless classic to life in a whole new way with charming diorama visuals, updated gameplay mechanics, and a streamlined story,.

For seasoned adventurers, rediscover a tale of plucky companions that is brimming with joy and heartbreak. For fledgling heroes new to the series, this is a great place to begin your DRAGON QUEST journey.

■A Diorama Brought to Life
DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined blends a beautiful diorama art style with Akira Toriyama's iconic character designs to make every encounter feel vibrant, heartfelt, and full of adventure. From lush forests and bustling towns to ancient ruins and whimsical monsters, every environment is bursting with color and personality.

■Travel through History to Restore the Present
Scattered stone fragments unlock portals to long-lost eras with their own challenges to solve. Restore the islands, solve mysteries, and make allies in the past to breathe life back into the present.

■A Beloved Tale with a Streamlined Narrative
DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined is told through a series of vignettes with an overarching narrative. The main story has also been streamlined to make the journey more accessible to all players. 

■Classic Combat, Improved!
The battle system in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined has undergone significant changes. Turn the tides of battle with new vocational perks. Each vocation has its own unique ability, from all-out attacks to those that support your allies. Battle speed adjustments and an auto-battle feature are also available. Battles can progress without interruptions between each turn, depending on the tactics selected for the protagonist and allies. While on the field, players can pre-emptively strike monsters and instantly defeat them If the monster is weaker than the party. 

■Moonlight and Level Up Two Vocations at the Same Time!
Customize your playstyle with the new Moonlighting mechanic. Having two vocations assigned at once provides access to the skills, magic spells, and unique perks from both.
70010000070158.intro: Unravel the mysteries of the past in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined
70010000070158.name: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined

70010000105927.description:
[Game Overview]  
A roguelite action game set in the BLAZBLUE universe, featuring striking 2D visuals, stylish, fast-paced combat, and precise, responsive controls.
Command a line-up of unique characters from the renowned BLAZBLUE franchise and dive into an unparalleled action experience.

[Story]
At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab”,a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.
In a last-ditch effort, the urgent *Research of Possibility* initiative seeks to collect *Shards of Possibility*—a special fragment of the world that could forestall the seemingly inevitable destruction.
These shards lie within the *Sea of Possibility*, a realm between worlds, beyond the bounds of reality.
Our protagonist, *Ace*, is the only being capable of diving into this sea.  
Guided by the elite researchers at *the Lab*, Ace descends again and again in pursuit of salvation—until strange visions take hold and his body begins to change.
As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world—and the research itself—begins to surface....
“……The Power of Azure.”
70010000105927.name: Blazblue Entropy Effect X

70010000081381.description:
Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit.. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand.

• A Tale of Emotion Versus Reason
Let emotions guide your destiny, or maintain order with the power of reason. Witness the eternal struggle between the head and the heart as Velvet is challenged to stand by her convictions while the world around her compresses into a system of order.

• An Exhilarating Combat System
Freely choose Artes to suit your playstyle and perform a variety of combos. Collect enemy Souls to unleash a barrage of attacks for a thrilling battle experience.

• A Modern, High-Quality Retelling
Useful features like destination markers and the ability to disable enemy encounters make traversing the islands of Midgand all the more enticing. Visit the famous Grade Shop from the game's opening. Get a smooth play experience only found in this remaster!

• Access DLC from the First Iteration
This version features several DLC from the original 2016 version. A treasure trove of content awaits you, such as outfits for your characters from the previous Tales Of games along with useful equipment for your travels.

*A Deluxe Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70010000081381.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered

70010000100974.description:
Sushi Cat Tower Defense introduces a new genre of gameplay to a beloved franchise!

This time around, Sushi Cat must defend himself from evil sushi hordes, corrupted by the wicked sorcerer cook Broccolinni. Only by eating enormous amounts of sushi will Sushi Cat be able to thwart Broccolinni's plans to control the world!

PREPARE YOU DEFENSES
• Deploy a variety of cat-themed towers
• Block key routes with maze-building walls
• Place traps to surprise and weaken enemies

ROGUELIKE STYLE
• Designed for quick runs with a single evolving level and Endless Mode
• Draft Boon Cards that define your strategy
• Defeat powerful boss enemies in every run
• Unlock permanent upgrades between games

SHAPE THE PATH
• Defend Sushi Cat from waves of sinister sushi enemies.
• Place defenses to prevent enemies from reaching Sushi Cat. Collect sushi and keep feeding him to expand his powers.
• Survive wave-based encounters while constructing obstacles, towers, & traps to build a winding maze for enemies to traverse through.

UNLOCK TALENTS & BOONS
• Upgrade your Talent Tree to unlock permanent power boosts.
• Unlock new towers and traps to expand your defensive options.
• Empower Sushi Cat with devastating new Ultimate abilities.
• Collect Boon Cards that shape each run with unique effects.
70010000100974.intro: Strategic tower defense meets roguelite chaos!
70010000100974.name: Sushi Cat - Tower Defense
